short_description: ideal tarim is a farm based in küçükçekmece, turkey.
generated_description: ideal agriculture is a group of companies that specializes in the production and export of fresh fruits and vegetables. the company has several subsidiaries, including ideal farm products trading a.ş., ideal tropicals costa rica sa, ideal agriculture malaysia products sdn bhd, and ideal holland bv. ideal agriculture promotes the production of good agricultural practices by encouraging domestic producers to export their products to global standards. the group aims to create value for the national economy by exporting products produced under "ideal quality standards" produced by local producers. ideal farm has been recognized by carrefoursa, a supermarket chain in turkey, for promoting the consumption of fresh vegetables.
